Name: Safe Shield
Description: Industry-first natively-integrated transaction security layer combining Safe multisig with Guardian
Key Features: Real-time threat detection, transaction simulation, policy enforcement, 300+ risk types, 70+ chains, 99.8% accuracy
Primary Use Case: Enterprise multisig wallet security with automated policy enforcement
Target Users: Treasury Teams | Asset Managers | Protocol Teams

Name: Hypernative Guardian
Description: Transaction simulation and policy enforcement engine with AI-driven risk detection
Key Features: Pre-transaction simulation, AI-based detection, policy automation, plain language explanations, MPC wallet support
Primary Use Case: Pre-transaction security validation and automated risk-based approval

Name: Hypernative Platform
Description: Real-time monitoring and detection identifying threats minutes before exploitation
Key Features: 99.5% detection rate, <0.001% false positives, 2-minute pre-detection, 250+ templates, automated response
Primary Use Case: Protocol-wide security monitoring and hack prevention

Name: Hypernative Screener
Description: Address reputation system across multiple blockchains for pre-transaction risk assessment
Key Features: Multi-chain reputation tracking, real-time risk scoring, API queries, protocol-level blocking
Primary Use Case: Address screening for compliance and fraud prevention

Name: Wallet Protect
Description: User protection layer alerting to malicious or risky behavioral patterns
Key Features: Behavioral pattern analysis, real-time alerts, user-level risk detection
Primary Use Case: End-user wallet protection and phishing prevention

Name: Hypernative Firewall
Description: Transaction-level policy enforcement preventing malicious interactions without protocol disruptions
Key Features: Surgical blocking, transaction-level filtering, protocol continuity preservation
Primary Use Case: Targeted attack mitigation during active exploits

Name: Sequencer/RPC Integration
Description: Pre-block inclusion transaction interception for L2 sequencers and RPC endpoints
Key Features: Pre-block interception, sequencer-level integration, early threat detection
Primary Use Case: L2 sequencer protection and RPC node security
